purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the properties of the fabrication technology selected for the interconnect substrate being designed.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module External item identification assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1128;
items within the scope of application module Feature and connection zone, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1671;
items within the scope of application module Generic material aspects, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1681;
items within the scope of application module Part feature location, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1714;
items within the scope of application module Physical layout template, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1722;
items within the scope of application module Requirement decomposition, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1740;
items within the scope of application module Shape property assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1032;
items within the scope of application module Specification document, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1747;
items within the scope of application module Value with unit extension, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1753.

ae.refpath: part_template_definition <= {shape_aspect (shape_aspect.description = 'material addition feature template') (shape_aspect.description = 'stratum feature template') (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size and component termination passage based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size and via based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default via based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default unsupported passage based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default component termination passage based')}

aa.refpath: part_template_definition <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect shape_aspect_relationship {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'of stratum technology'} shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect shape_aspect.of_shape -> product_definition_shape <= property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition = characterized_object characterized_object => stratum_technology

part_template_definition <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect shape_aspect_relationship {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'of stratum technology'} shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect shape_aspect.of_shape -> product_definition_shape <= property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition = characterized_object characterized_object => stratum_technology

electrical_isolation_removal_template_definition <= part_template_definition <= shape_aspect shape_definition = shape_aspect shape_definition characterized_definition = shape_definition characterized_definition <- property_definition.definition property_definition <- property_definition_relationship.related_property_definition property_definition_relationship property_definition_relationship.relating_property_definition -> property_definition => requirements_property => grouped_requirements_property {grouped_requirements_property <= group group.name = 'layout spacing requirements property'}
grouped_requirements_property <= group {(group.description = 'nearest boundary') (group.description = 'centroid') (group.description = 'furthest boundary')} group.description

requirements_property <= property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation representation.items[i] -> representation_item {representation_item (representation_item.name = 'tolerance') (representation_item.name = 'minimum tolerance') (representation_item.name = 'maximum tolerance') (representation_item.name = 'plus minus tolerance') (representation_item.name = 'symmetrical tolerance') (representation_item.name = 'statistical tolerance')}

stratum_technology <= characterized_object characterized_definition = characterized_object characterized_definition <- property_definition.definition property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation representation.name = 'physical characteristics representation'} representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'layer purpose'} representation_item => descriptive_representation_item {descriptive_representation_item (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'power or ground') (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'other signal') (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'lands only')}

stratum_technology <= characterized_object characterized_definition = characterized_object characterized_definition <- property_definition.definition property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation representation.name = 'physical characteristics representation'} representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'minimum finished feature size'} representation_item => measure_representation_item <= measure_with_unit => length_measure_with_unit

stratum_technology <= characterized_object characterized_definition = characterized_object characterized_definition <- property_definition.definition property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation representation.name = 'physical characteristics representation'} representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'minimum finished feature spacing'} representation_item => measure_representation_item <= measure_with_unit => length_measure_with_unit

stratum_technology <= characterized_object characterized_definition = characterized_object characterized_definition <- property_definition.definition property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation representation.name = 'physical characteristics representation'} representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'layer purpose'} representation_item => descriptive_representation_item {descriptive_representation_item (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'soldermask') (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'solderpaste') (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'silkscreen') (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'generic layer') (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'glue') (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'gluemask') (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'pastemask')}

ae.refpath: land_physical_template <= part_template_definition <= {shape_aspect (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size and component termination passage based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size and via based')}

aa.refpath: land_physical_template <= part_template_definition <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'maximum attachment region size'} shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect -> {shape_aspect shape_aspect.description = 'connection zone'} shape_aspect

land_physical_template <= part_template_definition <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'minimum attachment region size'} shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect -> {shape_aspect shape_aspect.description = 'connection zone'} shape_aspect

ae.refpath: land_physical_template <= part_template_definition <= {shape_aspect (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size and component termination passage based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size and via based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default via based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default unsupported passage based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default component termination passage based')}

aa.refpath: land_physical_template <= part_template_definition <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect shape_aspect_relationship {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'of stratum technology'} shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect shape_aspect.of_shape -> product_definition_shape <= property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition = characterized_object characterized_object => {characterized_object.description = 'design layer'} stratum_technology

dependent_material_removal_feature_template <= part_template_definition <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect shape_aspect_relationship {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'associated template'} shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect {[shape_aspect => part_template_definition => land_physical_template] [shape_aspect (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size and component termination passage based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size and via based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default via based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default unsupported passage based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default component termination passage based')]}

land_template_terminal <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect shape_aspect_relationship {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'associated definition'} shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect => {shape_aspect (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size and component termination passage based') (shape_aspect.description = 'default attachment size and via based')} part_template_definition => land_physical_template

ae.refpath: land_template_terminal <= shape_aspect {[shape_aspect (shape_aspect.description = 'interface terminal') (shape_aspect.description = 'join terminal')] [shape_aspect shape_aspect.of_shape -> product_definition_shape <= property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition product_definition [product_definition product_definition.formation -> product_definition_formation product_definition_formation.of_product -> product <- product_related_product_category.products[i] product_related_product_category <= product_category product_category.name = 'template model'] [product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'template definition']]}

aa.refpath: land_template_terminal <= shape_aspect shape_aspect.name

land_template_terminal <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'terminal connection zone'} shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.description {(shape_aspect_relationship.description = 'edge curve class') (shape_aspect_relationship.description = 'edge point class') (shape_aspect_relationship.description = 'surface area class') (shape_aspect_relationship.description = 'surface point class')}

land_template_terminal <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'terminal connection zone'} shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect {shape_aspect shape_aspect.description = 'connection zone'}

land_template_terminal <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect shape_aspect_relationship {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'associated definition'} shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect => part_template_definition => land_physical_template

stratum_technology <= characterized_object characterized_object.name
